#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;
int main()
{  
                string a,b;
                int c[21000];
               
                long long int u,l,l1,l2,i,j,zero,carry,pos,ans,p,flag,sub;
               cin>>u;
                getchar();
                while(u--)
                {         cin>>a>>b;
                          sub=0;
                          if(a[0]=='-' && b[0]!='-')
                           sub=1;
                            else
                             if(a[0]!='-' && b[0]=='-')
                             sub=1;
                             if(a[0]=='-')
                             a=a.substr(1);
                             if(b[0]=='-')
                             b=b.substr(1);
                           //  cout<<"a="<<a<<endl;
                            // cout<<"b="<<b<<endl;
                             
                          l1=a.length();
                          l2=b.length();
                          l=l1+l2;
                          zero=0;

               
                          /*for(p=0;p<=9;p++)
                          {                carry=0;
                                           pos=0;
                                           for(i=l1-1;i>=0;i--)
                                           {         //cout<<"ans="<<arr[ a[i]-48 ][p];
                                                     ans=( arr[ a[i]-48 ][p] )+carry;
                                                     //cout<<"ans+carry="<<ans<<endl;
                                                     all[p][pos]=all[p][pos]+ans;
                                                     carry=all[p][pos]/10;
                                                     //cout<<"carry="<<carry;
                                                      all[p][pos]=all[p][pos]%10; 
                                                     // cout<<"saved="<<all[p][pos];
                                                      pos++;
                                           }
                                           all[p][pos]=carry;
                          }*/
                                              
                          /*for(p=0;p<10;p++)
                          {       cout<<"*"<<p<<endl;
                                  for(i=0;i<=l1;i++)
                                  cout<<all[p][i];
                                  cout<<endl;
                          }*/
                          for(i=0;i<l;i++)
                          c[i]=0;
                          zero=0;                    
                          pos=zero;   
                          for(i=l2-1;i>=0;i--)
                          {                 pos=zero;   
                                           carry=0;
                                           for(j=l1-1;j>=0;j--)
                                           {       //cout<<"adding present"<<c[pos]<<"+"<<all[ b[i]-48] [j]<<endl;
                                                   ans=(a[j]-48)*(b[i]-48)+carry;
                                                   //cout<<"mult="<<ans<<endl;
                                                   c[pos]=c[pos]+ans;
                                                   //cout<<"adding="<<c[pos]<<endl;
                                                   carry=c[pos]/10;
                                                   //cout<<"cry="<<carry<<endl;
                                                   c[pos]=c[pos]%10;
                                                   //cout<<"final="<<c[pos]<<endl;
                                                   pos++;
                                           }
                                           if(carry>0)
                                           c[pos]=carry;
                                          // cout<<"99*9";
                                          // for(p=l-1;p>=0;p--)
                                           //cout<<c[p];
                                           //cout<<endl;
                                           zero++;
                          }
                          
                          flag=0;
                          //for(i=0;i<l;i++)
                          //cout<<c[i];
                          if(sub==1)
                          printf("-");
                          for(p=l-1;p>=0;p--)
                          {                  if(c[p]==0 && flag==0)
                                             continue; 
                                             else
                                             {flag=1;
                                             printf("%d",c[p]);
                                             }
                          }
                          if(flag==0)
                          cout<<"0";
                          printf("\n"); 
                         // cout<<"u="<<u;
                                          
               }
}
